DataElement.preferredName: Previous Assessment Total Diameter Nadir Occurrence Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calender date of aggregation of previously assessed lesion diameters.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Previous Assessment Total Diameter Nadir Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Occurring prior to something else._Having determined the value, significance, or extent of._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete._In the lowest position, nearest the ground, at the bottom; minimal in magnitude, lowest in rank or importance; an extreme state of adversity._Diameter; the length of a straight line passing through the center of a circle and connecting two points on the circumference.__In the lowest position, nearest the ground, at the bottom; minimal in magnitude, lowest in rank or importance; an extreme state of adversity._Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Occurring prior to something else.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.:Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:In the lowest position, nearest the ground, at the bottom; minimal in magnitude, lowest in rank or importance; an extreme state of adversity.:Diameter; the length of a straight line passing through the center of a circle and connecting two points on the circumference.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
In the lowest position, nearest the ground, at the bottom; minimal in magnitude, lowest in rank or importance; an extreme state of adversity.
The length of a straight line passing through the center of a circle or sphere and connecting two points on the circumference.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: any measurements, including linear dimensions, volume, and weight, of a patient's anatomic organs.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support Duke University Sarcoma trial
